Queen Celestine (amụrụ ya na 18 Machị n’afo 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na onye isi nri nke e kpuwere okpueze nke kachasị mma na Nigeria Universe 2014 ma nọchite anya Naijiria n'asọmpi Miss Universe 2014.
Queen bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Madonna na onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya Edo na Naịjirịa.
Queen sonyere na asọmpi Miss Nigeria 2013 ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ.
Queen meriri Miss Amity ma kpuwe ya okpueze dị ka MGBN Universe (Most Beautiful Girl in Nigeria) 2014 na July 19, 2014
N'otu ihe omume ahụ, e kpuwere ya okpueze ya na onye mmeri mbụ e kpuwere okpuezi dị ka MGBN World 2014, Iheoma Nnadi.
Queen sonyere na asọm mpi Miss Universe 2014 wee merie dịka Miss Congeniality.
